author: Ryan Gilliam
title: Pokémon Go will let friends raid together from home
description: As COVID-19 continues to affect the world, Niantic of Pokémon Go will evolve its game to be playable indoors. In its latest blog post, the studio revealed plans to allow players to raid with friends without leaving their homes, and experience Pokémon Go Fest …
